Sequence Information.Peptide Name: TtAP-2 (natural AMPs;XXA, UCLL1c, scorpions, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: Venom, the Trinidad Thick-Tailed Scorpion,Tityus trinitatis

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (88.89%) toscorpine Im5I=G: 24%; L=F: 12%. GRAVY: 1.59; Mol W: 1734.18; Mol formula: C84H136N18O19S1; Mol Ex coeff: 0.Activity: active against P.aeruginosa DSM 50071 (MIC >400 ug/ml), E. coli DSM 787 (MIC 100 ug/ml), K.pneumoniae ATCC BAA 1705 (MIC >100 ug/ml), A. baumannii DSM 30008 (MIC 50 ug/ml), S. aureus ATCC 43300 (MIC 25 ug/ml), S. epidermidis DSM 28319 (MIC 25 ug/ml), E. faecalis MF 06036 (MIC 50 ug/ml), E. faecium NCTC 12201 (MIC 25 ug/ml), and C. difficile DSM 27147 or ATCC BAA 1382 (MIC 25 ug/ml).Toxicity: murine RBC: HC50 31 ug/ml, highly hemolytic.
Literature Information.Author: Mechkarska M, Cunning TS, Taggart MG, Ternan NG, Leprince J, Coquet L, Jouenne T, Tena-Garc√©s J, Calvete JJ, Conlon JM. 2023
Literature Information.Title: Identification of an Antimicrobial Peptide from the Venom of the Trinidad Thick-Tailed Scorpion Tityus trinitatis with Potent Activity against ESKAPE Pathogens and Clostridioides difficile.
